creator: Abacus Classic Project
descriptionHtml:
AbacusClassic Calculator is a free simple basic calculator app with additional functions and features. Designed for Android phones and tablets, Calculator brings you customized theme colors and number display formats, calculations of time and numbers, simple Preferences settings, User’s Guide built-in, and ads. Download now for free to experience Calculator’s improved look and feel.

With a 3-line display for calculation history, current entries and results, and memory values, Calculator is easy to see all values at a glance and helps you trace your calculations easily. All 3 display lines can be copied to the clipboard and pasted on other apps.

Calculator is designed for shoppers, travelers, part time workers and other frequent users. Additional functions and features make easy and simple to find out grocery amounts, tips, taxes, discounted amounts, working hours, and more.

Calculator features the following:

Improve Calculator's appearance. With no grid lines around the keys, a visually simple monolithic style theme makes Calculator's look and feel simple, clean, modern yet elegant.

Calculate easy and tap less. All functions are displayed and directly accessible on the monolithic theme. Neither a shift key nor swiping is required. Simply tap numbers and functions to get the result. Every entry is highlighted when short and long tapped.

Trace back your calculation history easy. With a glance, it is easy to review your entries in the history display. Your operations are built up and shown as calculation history until you clear out. The calculation history is wrapped when the display is filled.

Resume your last calculation anytime. Whenever you return to Calculator, your calculation data is automatically restored on the display and your calculation is always ready to be continued.

Customize your theme and display with unlimited colors. Through color palettes, you can choose your style from selected color sets for the theme and display colors, or customize the color sets to your favorite ones with color sliders.

Set your own number display formats. For your number style on the calculator displays, you can select round-up places and value as well as number separation markers. With your chosen number formats, the displayed numbers are as easy to read and accurate as you need.

Compare your setups. After setting up the theme colors and number formats, your recent settings are compared with the previous and default settings simply by tapping buttons.

Learn about Calculator offline through User's Guide. Whenever you need operational information or some help about Calculator, User’s Guide is built in and you can simply tap User's Guide anywhere anytime.

The following functions improve usability:

Basics
* 5 arithmetic operators: multiplication, division, modulo, addition, and subtraction
* Percentage calculations: including markup, discount, profit, and margin
* Memory calculations: addition, subtraction, clear, and recall
* Backspace and Clear: Delete your last entry.
* Clear All: Remove calculation errors and clear all displays except Memory and User Memory values.

Additional selected functions
* Hour-minute time calculation: Calculate hour and minute results instantly, with automatic minute conversions and carry-ups/downs.
* Square and square-root
* Reciprocal
* Sign-change
* Clipboard copy and erase
* User Memory: Store your important number, such as a tax rate, foreign exchange rate, Fibonacci value and others, to re-use for later calculations.
* App Turn-Off: Turn off the Calculator app and free up Calculator resources without losing Calculator data. When turning back on, the resume feature helps you continue the last calculation.

Download for free, visit User's Guide and learn more about what Calculator can do for you.

If you find a bug or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

AbacusClassicProject@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Customize colors & numbers. Make Calculator’s look & feel simple yet modern.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Minor update release (1.2.0) includes:
* Clipboard copying and erasing features added
* Bugs fixed and performance improved
* User's Guide updated

descriptionHtml:
AbacusClassic Calculator for Android phones and tablets is a free simple basic calculator app with additional functions and features. * Memory calculations: addition, subtraction, clear, and recall
* Backspace & Clear: Delete your last entries.
* Clear All: Clear all displays and reset calculation data except Memory and User Memory values.

* Square & square-root
* Reciprocal
* Sign-change
* Clipboard copy & erase for calculation displays

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have successfully completed our first app development year. This time, we have decided to release an ad-free version to express our appreciation and cheer up everybody around the world. If you like this version as well, we would appreciate your ratings and reviews.

Maintenance release (1.2.8) includes:
* Ad suspended only for this version (ad to be resumed from the next version)
* Bugs fixed and performance improved
* User's Guide updated

Thank you for visiting us. Have a nice day!

* User Memory: Store your important number, such as a tax rate, foreign exchange rate, and others, to re-use for later calculations.
* App Turn-Off: Turn off the Calculator app and free up Calculator resources without losing Calculator data. When turning back on, the resume feature helps you continue the last calculation.

Download for free, visit Quick Guide and learn more about what Calculator can do for you.

If you find a bug or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

AbacusClassicProject@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Unlimited color styles! FREE basic calculator with extra functions and features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Maintenance release (1.2.16) includes:
* Replaced User's Guide with a simpler version of Quick Guide
* Modified button behaviors in Preferences
* Updated database structures
* Fixed crashing issues on some devices with Android OS 5.x and earlier
* Fixed other bugs and improved performance

title: Calculator = Basic x Style + Simple + Free

creator: Abacus Classic Project
descriptionHtml:
AbacusClassic Calculator for Android phones and tablets is a free simple basic calculator app with additional functions and features. Calculator brings you customized theme colors and photo, number display format choices, calculations of time and numbers, simple Preferences, built-in Quick Guide and upper-screen ads. Calculator's 3-line display is easy to see all calculation values at a glance, and helps you trace and correct your entries. Operational messages are also provided. Your calculations can be shared through the clipboard. Download now for free to experience Calculator’s improved look and feel.

Designed for shoppers, travelers, part time workers and other frequent users, Calculator’s functions and features make easy and simple to find grocery amounts, tips, taxes, discounted amounts, working hours, and more.

Calculator features to:

Improve Calculator's appearance. With no grid lines around the keys, a visually simple monolithic style theme makes Calculator's look and feel simple, clean, modern yet elegant.

Calculate easy & touch less. All functions are displayed and directly accessible on the monolithic theme. Neither a shift key nor swiping is required. Simply touch numbers and functions to get the result. Every entry is highlighted when touched and long-touched for underlined second functions.

Trace your calculation history easy. With a glance, it is easy to review your entries in the history display. Your operations or expressions are built up and shown as calculation history until you clear out. The display is automatically scrolled down during calculations and manually up and down.

Resume your last calculation anytime. Whenever you return to Calculator, your calculation data is automatically restored on the display and your calculation is always ready to be continued. From the expressions in the history, you can easily find where you have left off in your calculation.

Customize your theme & display with unlimited colors. Through color palettes, you can choose your style from selected color sets for the theme and display colors, or customize the color sets to your favorite ones with color sliders. Even more, you can personalize Calculator with your great photo.

Set your own number display formats. For your number style on the calculator displays, you can select round-up places and value as well as number separation markers. With your chosen number formats, the displayed numbers are as easy to read and accurate as you need.

Compare your setups. After setting up the theme colors and number formats, your recent settings are compared with the previous and default settings simply by touching buttons.

The following functions improve usability:

Basics
* 5 arithmetic operators: multiplication, division, modulo, addition, and subtraction
* Percentage calculations: including markup, discount, profit, and margin
* Memory calculations: addition, subtraction, clear, and recall
* Backspace & Clear: Delete your last entries.
* Clear All: Clear all displays and reset calculation data except Memory and User Memory values.

Additional functions
* Hour-minute time calculation: Calculate hour and minute results instantly, with automatic minute conversions and carry-ups/downs.
* Square & square-root
* Reciprocal
* Sign-change
* Clipboard copy & erase for displayed values
* Text-selection copy for history
* User Memory: Store your important number, such as a tax rate, foreign exchange rate, and others, to re-use for later calculations.
* App Turn-Off: Turn off the Calculator app and free up Calculator resources without losing Calculator data. When turning back on, the resume feature helps you continue the last calculation.

Download for free, visit Quick Guide and learn more about what Calculator can do for you.

If you find a bug or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

AbacusClassicProject@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Unlimited color styles! FREE basic calculator with extra functions and features.

title: Calculator = Basic x Style + Simple

creator: Abacus Classic Project
descriptionHtml:
AbacusClassic Calculator for Android phones and tablets or Chromebooks is a free minimal-designed simple basic calculator app with additional functions and features. Calculator brings you customizable theme colors and photo, number display format choices, calculations of time and numbers, simple Preferences, built-in Quick Guide and hidable upper-screen ads. Calculator's 3-line display is easy to see all calculation values at a glance, and helps you double-check your entries faster. Your calculations can be shared through the clipboard. Experience Calculator’s improved look and feel.

Calculator’s features and functions make easy and simple for everyday calculations such as grocery amounts, tips, taxes, discounts, working hours, and more. The features include:

Improve Calculator's appearance. With no grid lines around the keys, a visually simple minimalistic style theme makes Calculator's look and feel simple, clean, modern yet elegant.

Hide ads temporarily. In the important meetings or transactions, ads hiding options keep you undisturbed from ads.

Calculate easy & press less. All functions are displayed and directly accessible on the theme. Neither a shift key nor swiping is required. Simply press numbers and functions to get the result. Every entry is highlighted when pressed or long-pressed.

Trace your calculation history easy. With a glance, it is easy to double-check your entries in the history display. Your operations or expressions are built up and shown as calculation history until you clear out. The display is automatically scrolled down during calculations and manually up and down.

Resume your last calculation anytime. Whenever you return to Calculator, your calculation data is automatically restored on the display and your calculation is always ready to be continued. From the history, you can easily find where you have left off in your calculation.

Customize your theme and display with unlimited colors and photos. Through color palettes, you can choose your style from selected color sets for the theme and display colors, or customize the color sets to your favorite ones with color sliders. Even more, you can personalize Calculator with your gallery photos.

Set your own number display formats. For your number style on the calculator displays, you can select round-up places and value as well as number separation markers. With your chosen number formats, the displayed numbers are as easy to read and accurate as you need. The displayed text sizes are also customizable.

Compare your setups. After setting up the theme and number formats, your recent settings are compared with the previous and default simply by pressing buttons.

The following functions improve usability:

Basics
* 5 arithmetic operators: multiplication, division, modulo, addition, and subtraction
* Percentage calculations: including markup, discount, profit, and margin
* Memory calculations: addition, subtraction, clear, and recall
* Backspace & Clear: Delete your last entries.
* Clear All: Clear all displays and reset calculation data except Memory and User Memory values.

Additional functions
* Hour-minute time calculation: Calculate hour and minute results instantly.
* Square & square-root
* Reciprocal
* Sign-change
* Clipboard copy & erase for displayed values
* Text-selection copy for history
* User Memory: Store your important number, such as a tax rate, foreign exchange rate, and others, to re-use for later calculations.
* Turn-Off: Turn off the Calculator app and free up Calculator resources without losing Calculator data. When turning back on, the resume feature helps you continue the last calculation.

Visit the built-in Quick Guide and learn more about what Calculator can do for you.

If you find a bug or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

AbacusClassicProject@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Simple basic calculator, your alternative with unlimited color styles and extras

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Minor update release (1.4.0) includes the following new features, bug fixes and performance improvements:
* Renewed Preferences UI
* Ads hiding options (New)
* Display text size adjustments (New)
* Fixed reported round-up issues
* Renewed Calculator key fonts
* Updated Quick Guide

Note: ca, sto, and off keys, with a underline, require a long press.
